statements: SELECT * FROM smart_contracts_history;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, interaction_type FROM smart_contracts_history WHERE interaction_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT contract_name, interaction_date FROM smart_contracts_history WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts_history WHERE interaction_type = 'transaction' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM smart_contracts_history WHERE contract_address LIKE '%0xABC%';
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts_history ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, contract_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT contract_name, interaction_type FROM smart_contracts_history WHERE contract_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND interaction_type = 'update' ORDER BY contract_name ASC
SELECT MAX(interaction_date) AS latest_interaction_date, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM smart_contracts_history
SELECT contract_name, interaction_date FROM smart_contracts_history WHERE interaction_type = 'create' ORDER BY contract_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM smart_contracts_history
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, creation_date FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM contract_interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT contract_id, action FROM contract_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM smart_contracts WHERE creator_address = '0x123ABC';
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts LIMIT 5;
SELECT contract_name, creation_date FROM smart_contracts WHERE creator_address = '0xABCDEF';
SELECT contract_name, creation_date, creator_address FROM smart_contracts WHERE creation_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;

SELECT contract_name, interaction_date, action FROM smart_contracts JOIN contract_interactions ON smart_contracts.contract_id = contract_interactions.contract_id WHERE action = 'transfer' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT interaction_date, action FROM contract_interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, developer_name, deployment_date FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY deployment_date DESC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, deployment_date FROM smart_contracts WHERE developer_name = 'Alice';

SELECT c.contract_id, i.interaction_type, t.transaction_hash FROM smart_contracts c JOIN contract_interactions i ON c.contract_id = i.contract_id JOIN blockchain_transactions t ON i.interaction_id = t.interaction_id;
SELECT MAX(block_number) AS max_block_number, MIN(block_number) AS min_block_number FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT contract_name, developer_name FROM smart_contracts WHERE deployment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, interaction_id, block_number FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT contract_name, deployment_date, developer_name FROM smart_contracts WHERE deployment_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY deployment_date ASC;

SELECT contract_name, interaction_data FROM smart_contracts JOIN contract_interactions ON smart_contracts.contract_id = contract_interactions.contract_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Call' ORDER BY interaction_data DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, deployment_date FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM contract_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT blockchain_address, developer_name FROM smart_contracts WHERE deployment_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT metadata_key, metadata_value FROM contract_metadata WHERE metadata_key LIKE 'version%';
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE developer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT contract_name, deployment_date FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY deployment_date DESC;
SELECT c.contract_name, m.metadata_key, m.metadata_value FROM smart_contracts c JOIN contract_metadata m ON c.contract_id = m.contract_id;
SELECT count(*) AS total_transactions, sum(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM blockchain_transactions;

SELECT ci.interaction_date, ci.interaction_type, cm.metadata_key FROM contract_interactions ci LEFT JOIN contract_metadata cm ON ci.contract_id = cm.contract_id WHERE ci.interaction_type = 'READ' ORDER BY ci.interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, deployment_date FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY deployment_date DESC;
SELECT creator_address FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 3;
SELECT contract_name, event_name, event_date FROM smart_contracts JOIN contract_events ON smart_contracts.contract_id = contract_events.contract_id;
SELECT DISTINCT creator_address FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE deployment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT contract_name, creator_address FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_name DESC;
SELECT contract_name, deployment_date FROM smart_contracts WHERE creator_address='0x123456789';

SELECT contract_name, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM contract_interactions JOIN smart_contracts ON contract_interactions.contract_id = smart_contracts.contract_id WHERE contract_name='Example Contract';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_description FROM contract_events WHERE contract_id = 5 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
